Name: Let's Puzzle
About the game: Let's Puzzle is a collection of beautiful pictures from yourself and from others. You can sit at home, relax and solve fun puzzles. Get rid of the tiredness of the whole day and plunge into the wonderful puzzle world. A stress relieving and relaxing game suitable for everyone with different difficulty levels from easy to hard, from 100 to over 3000 pieces, from beginner to master. Challenge yourself to reveal what is hidden in a picture. Customize your puzzle experience by using your own music, whether from your PC or Spotify. Make Let's Puzzle your very own game. Are you ready? Upload your own puzzles right now and share them with your friends. FEATURES: Play together with your friends and solve puzzles together Create your custom puzzles using pictures from your own computer Use videos to create puzzles to bring even more life to your creations Wonderful pictures Solve puzzles Choose your own music from your computer or Spotify Easy to control with a smooth touch Multiple difficulties Multiple soothing music and game backgrounds Relax and feel the stress leaving your body
